section.name: Exercises
section.page: Two exercises on this page ask confidence intervals about the difference between two group proportions based on sample proportions; the second is a little harder than the first.
This exercise asks for the hypotheses, p-value and conclusion when testing whether two group proportions are equal, both with one- and two-tailed alternatives.

page.nameOverride: Expected cell counts in contingency tables

section.page: This exercise shows a contingency table and asks for the expected cell count in one of the table cells, assuming the row and column variables are independent.
In this exercise, the test statistic and p-value are provided for a chi-squared test applied to a contingency table. You are asked to interprete the result of the test.
